p: There are more than 100 research plans around the world to find a vaccine - claimed by the United Nations as the only way back to “normality” - seven are presently in clinical trials, according to the Tropical Medicine and London School of Hygiene. These kinds of trials are already underway in the United States and China and will start at the end of this month in Germany ( https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/08/health/coronavirus-vaccines.html).
